author: Amazon Customer

review: I watch Netflix and Amazon Prime. I cut cable a year ago. This is the perfect level for me. I skip the pay apps "free" trial stuff and games. I love the aPrime selection. It's vast. Coupled with Netflix? Match made in heaven. I really like the build quality, the voice command, and the cat5 / Ethernet option to connect to the router. In my apartment, skip giving wifi hackers a chance. Except for chump apps like ESPN or NFL or Hulu which all buffer like 1995 AOL in the Caribbean? Netflix and Amazon shows / movies are SEAMLESS and awesome with flow and HD when available. I love it and Amazon Customer Service for helping me through a Snafu that landed me in the position to consider and ultimately commit to Fire TV over the stick.
